column4: i boot into ubunto the loading screen was distorted, i go to the pasword the boot sound runs 3 times and crunches at the 4 time, my mous worked for 2 sec then everying frozeagter 1 min my mous moved again and i cant puch any button
now im back on my win7
i dont get where the problem lies
is it my keybeor or mous, or is it my prosecor
That sounds rather strange... if the system boots at all, it probably isn't your CPU
Are you sure you closed the installation with success?
got any idea whyat it cazn be
There is no way to continue the log in?
It can't be the CPU really... your system wouldn't boot at all, let alone successfully run Windows
You could try to clock it normally just to see if that may cause the issue
So Windows refuses to work when you do not overclock your CPU?
I, personally, don't mind. But there are frequently people in this channel who really don't want to hear such words.
It's virtually impossible to get a blue screen when NOT overclocking, you're either overclocking wrongly or doing something else completely wrong
I'd recommend resetting your motherboard and clock everything at their defaults
